text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump What a tremendous love for America when he ignores the warnings in late 2019, Jan and Feb2020 about the Pandemic. He did nothing but lied saying everything was in order. His mismanagement causes over 100000 deaths.  His coming rally will spread the coronavirus. Is this Love ?
